content: this pattern is an add-on to courtney laube s galaxy far far away pattern available here on ravelry http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/a-galaxy-far-far-away it includes the charts i made for the blanket and the technique i used to make it each square is about 17cm * 17cm 6 7 and the whole blanket is about 100 x 120cm 40 x 47 here is my blog post about it http //www ahookamigurumi com/en/may-the-4th-be-with-me-and-my-crochet-hook-a-star-wars-blanket/
